doc.title: AI Tools Finder - Epic Breakdown
doc.snippet: Story 1.4 establishes the UI component foundation. Create reusable UI components (Button, Input, Card, Modal, Loading, Error, Header, Footer) using shadcn/ui, configure design tokens in Tailwind, and ensure accessibility compliance (WCAG 2.1 AA).

doc.title: AI Tools Finder UX Design Specification
doc.snippet: shadcn/ui is the chosen component library. Modern, customizable, built on Radix UI primitives, excellent accessibility (WCAG compliant), Tailwind CSS based, TypeScript support. Components provided: Form components, Navigation, Overlays, Feedback, Data Display, Layout.

doc.title: AI Tools Finder UX Design Specification
doc.snippet: Professional & Trustworthy theme. Primary: #2563eb (Blue 600), Secondary: #64748b (Slate 500), Accent: #10b981 (Emerald 500). Semantic colors: Success, Warning, Error, Info. Neutral colors: Background, Text Primary/Secondary, Border.

doc.title: AI Tools Finder UX Design Specification
doc.snippet: Font Family: Inter (headings and body), JetBrains Mono (monospace). Type Scale: H1 (2.25rem), H2 (1.875rem), H3 (1.5rem), H4 (1.25rem), Body (1rem), Small (0.875rem), Tiny (0.75rem). Font Weights: Regular (400), Medium (500), Semibold (600), Bold (700).

doc.title: AI Tools Finder UX Design Specification
doc.snippet: Base Unit: 4px. Spacing Scale: xs (4px), sm (8px), md (16px), lg (24px), xl (32px), 2xl (48px), 3xl (64px). Layout Grid: Desktop (12-column, 24px gutters), Tablet (8-column, 16px gutters), Mobile (4-column, 16px gutters). Container Widths: Desktop (1280px max), Tablet/Mobile (100% with padding).

doc.title: AI Tools Finder - Architecture Document
doc.snippet: shadcn/ui is the chosen design system. Latest version, accessible, customizable, TypeScript support. Tailwind CSS 3.x for styling, aligns with shadcn/ui, utility-first approach.
